name: Sludgehammer Pestiary
description:
The Sludgehammer Pestiary contains stats for 13 NPCs who could either help or hinder your party as they traverse the garbage-strewn wasteland known as The Dump. This supplement also contains an optional table for loot dropped by defeated  monsters. 

Based on Sledgehammer by Gayhalforc. Sludgehammer is an independent work compatible with Sledgehammer but not affiliated with Gayhalforc.
